CREATE TABLE #__jp_images ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `src` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `alt` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `width` mediumint(6) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `height` mediumint(6) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `size` int(20) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `type` varchar(15) NOT NULL default '', `preview` blob, `broken` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `simtime` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY (`src`,`simtime`) );

CREATE TABLE #__jp_links ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `href` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `type` set('external','internal') NOT NULL default 'internal', `status` set('indexed','new') NOT NULL default 'new', `simtime` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `contenttype` varchar(45) NOT NULL default '', `errcode` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `moved` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `tagtitle` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `pagesize` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `imagessize` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE #__jp_pages ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `original` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `sef` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `meta_title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `meta_description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `meta_keywords` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `component` varchar(45) NOT NULL default 'com_frontpage', `published` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `newmeta_title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `newmeta_description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `newmeta_keywords` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `checked_out` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `new_title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `robots_follow` set('follow','nofollow') NOT NULL default 'follow', `robots_index` set('index','noindex') NOT NULL default 'index', `status` set('r','y','g') NOT NULL default 'r', `google_pr` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `alexa_pr` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `issitemap` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `ishidden` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `isindexed` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `errcode` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `keywords` tinytext, `google_weight` char(4) NOT NULL default '', `hiden_sitemap` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `changefreq` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `page_size` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `images_size` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY (`original`) );

CREATE TABLE `#__jp_google_tools` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(55) NOT NULL default '', `date` date NOT NULL default '0000-00-00', `value` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
